title: What's Next For Metal Gear Solid? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.25.20
description:
NZXT BLD is the simplest way to get a gaming PC, customized the way you want. Learn more here: http://nzxt.co/KindaFunnyYT

Head to http://logitechg.com and use code KFGAMES for 10% off select
products!

Thanks to Klarna. Download the Klarna app today to shop thousands of online stores and pay for anything in four easy, interest-free payments.

Go to http://hellofresh.com/games80 and use code games80 to get a total of $80 off your first month, including free shipping on your first box!

 Blessing and Tim round out the week once again by talking about Metal Gear ports, Rocket League's success, and... Cowboys? 

00:00:00 - Start
00:04:08 - Housekeeping
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Tom Bock, Mohammed Mohammed, & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:04:30 - The Metal Gear series is hitting PC… TODAY - Gabe Gurwin @ Gamespot
00:16:40 - Rocket League Free-to-play is a huge hit - Marie Dealessandri @ GiBiz
00:20:45 - Dontnod is opening a new studio - Jordan Ramée @ Gamespot
00:22:45 - Another Sony Patent: This time it’s inside-out VR tracking - Jordan Oloman @ IGN
00:29:08 - Krafton is merging with PUBG Corp - Brendan Sinclair @ GiBiz
00:31:25 - A Yakuza movie is coming - Dave McNary @ Variety
00:36:15 - Out today
00:42:30 -  NZXT
00:44:00 -  Logitech
00:45:08 -  KLARNA
00:46:35 -  Hello Fresh
 Reader mail   -
00:50:20 - While Luna could kill Stadia should we also be concerned this might also die off as well? - Borzen00
00:57:30 - Squad Up:Rocketguardian(Steam)
00:58:00 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
MON: Blessing and Tim
TUES: Blessing and Imran
WED: Greg and Whitta
THURS: Greg and Tim
FRI: Greg and Blessing

Every day Greg Miller, Blessing Adeoye Jr., and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.
